question_text: Do you work in healthcare where you might be exposed to patients or virus?
more information: A full list of what counts is listed under "Healthcare Personnel (Phase 1A)" at https://covid19.nj.gov/faqs/nj-information/slowing-the-spread/who-is-eligible-for-vaccination-in-new-jersey-who-is-included-in-the-vaccination-phases

question_text: Do you live in a long-term care facility/ congregate care facility? (for example: skilled nursing facilities, veterans homes, group homes, assisted living facilities, county jails, juvenile detention)
more information: A full list of what counts is listed under "Long-Term Care Residents and Staff (Phase 1A)" at https://covid19.nj.gov/faqs/nj-information/slowing-the-spread/who-is-eligible-for-vaccination-in-new-jersey-who-is-included-in-the-vaccination-phases

question_text: Do you work in a long-term care facility/ congregate care facility? (for example: skilled nursing facilities, veterans homes, group homes, assisted living facilities, county jails, juvenile detention)
more information: A full list of what counts is listed under "Long-Term Care Residents and Staff (Phase 1A)" at https://covid19.nj.gov/faqs/nj-information/slowing-the-spread/who-is-eligible-for-vaccination-in-new-jersey-who-is-included-in-the-vaccination-phases

question_text: Are you a law enforcement officer? (for example: police officer, detective in prosecutor office)
more information: A full list of what counts is listed under "First Responders (Phase 1B)" at https://covid19.nj.gov/faqs/nj-information/slowing-the-spread/who-is-eligible-for-vaccination-in-new-jersey-who-is-included-in-the-vaccination-phases

A full list of what counts is listed under "First Responders (Phase 1B)" at https://covid19.nj.gov/faqs/nj-information/slowing-the-spread/who-is-eligible-for-vaccination-in-new-jersey-who-is-included-in-the-vaccination-phases

question_text: Are you a first responder? (for example: Aeronautical Operations Specialist, Search and Rescue team member, Rescue and HAZMAT services)
more information: A full list of what counts is listed under "First Responders (Phase 1B)" at https://covid19.nj.gov/faqs/nj-information/slowing-the-spread/who-is-eligible-for-vaccination-in-new-jersey-who-is-included-in-the-vaccination-phases

question_text: Do you have a condition that increases your risk of severe illness, according to CDC guidelines?
more information: The CDC says these factors increase your risk of severe illness from the virus: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/need-extra-precautions/people-with-medical-conditions.html

question_text: Have you recently received a solid organ transplant?
Are you classified as a frontline essential worker?
Are you any other type of essential worker?
